data.name: SNOW - Snowboard Pack
data.detailed_description:
Purchase the Snowboard Pack DLC and rule the mountain on you board! Save over $70 by purchasing this DLC.

The Snowboard Pack DLC includes the All Access Basic Pass giving you access to all mountains, activities, drop points, events, and rewards for 3 months. Please note: this Ski Pass requires activating once in-game. Visit My Ski Passes in the Me Menu to activate it.



The Snowboard Pack also comes with all the clothing and equipment you need to ski in style, including 6 Equipment Items, and 10 Clothing Items from the biggest snowboard brands for you to customize your character with. Also included in the Snowboard Pack are the Snowmobile and Prop Tool feature unlocks, so you can explore faster and customize your mountain immediately.

The following items are included in the Snowboard Pack DLC:

data.short_description: The Snowboard Pack DLC includes the All Access Basic Pass giving you access to all mountains, activities, drop points, events, and rewards for 3 months, the Snowmobile and Prop Tool feature unlocks, and 16 rare items to customize your character with.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista SP1, Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The system requirements are provided as a baseline for development, but are not guaranteed due to the game currently being in development. Requirements may be changed as the game progresses. Note: Integrated graphics cards are not supported.
